text: Call screen can now be collapsed during a call
Compression of video when sent in DM/Channel
Free space is now limited to 100 MB

MAJOR FEATURE for External Link: When a Folder is shared using an External Link, the Receivers can now View, Download and UPLOAD files to the shared folder from any device without creating a Sharekey account. Just turn ON the option “Upload to Folder”
Discover in menu People : Indicator added to easily turn ON and OFF your visibility. By default your profile is set to NOT visible
Cybersecurity: additional advanced cryptographic protection for Video Conferencing
Cybersecurity: Additional cryptographic protection for Messages & Drive to enhance data security.
Major Performance improvement including enhanced sending & scrolling experience for messages.
Improved Video Call experience: double tap on the screen to change the video display, 2 modes offered ("contain" vs. "full cover") for a better viewing experience.
Encrypted Push Notifications: it is now possible to display messages from New Contacts and New Channels without opening the app.
Channels: New indicator when messages are received.
